Articles.Content:
Hello

I've just setup a Science lab around Minmus.. And I've put two kerbals inside it..

Is it not possible to remove the Kerbals once they are inside??

Any help would be great!

Thanks

Edited December 18, 2013 by ChrisMayhew
The lab is like how the Hitchhiker was until recently: no IVA. To get the Kerbals out, click on the entry hatch. A box will appear with the Kerbals' names in it and the option to EVA them.
^ So make sure you only have one pilot in the command pod ! (if you want them to return)

The lab is like how the Hitchhiker was until recently: no IVA. To get the Kerbals out, click on the entry hatch. A box will appear with the Kerbals' names in it and the option to EVA them.

Ah thanks for the help! I've yet to use the Hitchhiker pod with more than one Kerbal so I didn't have multiple in it
